item.sent1: He had clearly abandoned all pretense of trying to succeed. 他已经清楚地放弃了尝试成功的所有借口。
item.sent2: Alex didn't abandon Tessa, though, and Carmen wasn't about to walk out on him like Tessa did. 亚历克斯并没有放弃泰莎，虽然和卡门是不是走出他像泰萨一样。
item.synonym: renounce, relinquish, dispense with, disclaim, forgo, disown, disavow, discard, wash one's hands of
